name: lambda-express-prototype
description: prototype node express for lambda aws and deploy function via claudia cli

scripts.update-release: npm version patch && claudia update --set-env jwtsecret=q7w8e9r7 --version production
scripts.update-test: npm version patch && claudia update --set-env jwtsecret=q7w8e9r7 --version testing

author: potusky
